description: AI Builder prompts for all MCMAP v7.0 agents

prompts.name: ORC Intent Classifier
prompts.description: Classifies user intent and routes to appropriate specialist agent
prompts.template:
You are the MCMAP Orchestrator Agent responsible for intent classification and routing.

Analyze the user's request and determine:
1. Primary intent category (analytics, audience, channel, document, performance, consulting, growth, deployment)
2. Confidence score (0-100)
3. Target agent code (ANL, AUD, CHA, SPO, DOC, PRF, CST, CHG, MKT, GHA, DVO)
4. Required context to pass to specialist
5. Any clarifying questions needed

User Request: {{user_message}}
Session Context: {{session_context}}
Previous Interactions: {{interaction_history}}

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "intent_category": "string",
  "confidence": number,
  "target_agent": "string",
  "routing_keywords": ["string"],
  "context_to_pass": {},
  "clarifying_questions": [],
  "reasoning": "string"
}

prompts.name: ORC Gate Validator
ORC Session Summarizer
prompts.description: Creates session summary for handoff or completion

prompts.name: ANL Projection Calculator
prompts.description: Calculates media projections based on budget and parameters

prompts.name: ANL Scenario Runner
prompts.description: Runs what-if scenarios for media planning
prompts.template:
Run a what-if scenario analysis for the media plan.

Base Plan: {{base_plan}}
Scenario Type: {{scenario_type}}
Modifications: {{modifications}}
Constraints: {{constraints}}

Analyze:
1. Impact on reach and frequency
2. Impact on cost efficiency
3. Trade-offs involved
4. Risk assessment
5. Recommendation

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "scenario_name": "string",
  "base_metrics": {},
  "modified_metrics": {},
  "delta": {},
  "impact_analysis": "string",
  "trade_offs": [],
  "risks": [],
  "recommendation": "string"
}

prompts.name: ANL Anomaly Detector
AUD Segment Creator
prompts.description: Creates audience segments based on criteria

prompts.name: AUD LTV Calculator
prompts.description: Calculates customer lifetime value for segments

prompts.name: CHA Allocation Optimizer
CHA Benchmark Lookup
prompts.description: Retrieves relevant benchmarks for channel planning

prompts.name: SPO Fee Analyzer
SPO Partner Evaluator
DOC Document Generator
DOC Brief Creator
PRF Attribution Analyzer
PRF Learning Extractor
CST Framework Selector
CST Strategy Developer
CHG Readiness Assessor
prompts.template:
Assess organizational readiness for change.

Change Initiative: {{change_initiative}}
Organization Profile: {{org_profile}}
Stakeholder Map: {{stakeholders}}
Current State: {{current_state}}

Assess:
1. Overall readiness score
2. Readiness by dimension
3. Barrier analysis
4. Enabler identification
5. Recommended actions

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "readiness_score": number,
  "dimensions": {
    "leadership": number,
    "culture": number,
    "capability": number,
    "capacity": number,
    "motivation": number
  },
  "barriers": [],
  "enablers": [],
  "risk_areas": [],
  "recommended_actions": [],
  "priority_interventions": []
}

prompts.name: CHG Adoption Planner
MKT GTM Planner
MKT Competitive Analyzer
DOCS Content Access
prompts.template:
Retrieve relevant documentation for the user query.

User Query: {{user_query}}
Documentation Index: {{doc_index}}
Context: {{context}}

Provide:
1. Relevant documentation sections
2. Step-by-step guidance
3. Related topics
4. Examples if available
5. Further resources

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "response": "string",
  "documentation_sections": [],
  "step_by_step": [],
  "related_topics": [],
  "examples": [],
  "further_resources": []
}

prompts.name: DVO Agent Validator
DVO Deployment Planner
DVO Rollback Executor
